body.p:
State of Kentucky
Grant County
Feby 4th 1865
To his excellency
T AE. Bramlette
Govenor of Ky --

The undersigned a citizen of grant County would respectfully solicit at your hands the remission of a fine of Twenty Five Dollars ($25) -- imposed against me at the October term of The Grant Circuit Court. for playing at a game of cards. The inditement was found upon a game which was merely for amusement being played for sigars and drinks, which I think is ^not^ sufficient to be considered a violation of the Law -- Your Clemency in this matter, to the extent of the Law, will be greatly appreciated, and will ever pray &c --
The following Petitioners join in the above prayer & hope you will remit the fine aforsaid --

J C Sayers --
J W Bryan
L Senly

Grant Cir Ct
vs
D. E. Craig
$25 --
Remit because of the good news this morning
